comments:
I20060215-0010

I was debugging Eclipse, and when a breakpoint was hit, a job error dialog came up. Log below.

I'm filing this as a new bug, since the line number in
   ...doAttemptSelectionToWidget(AsynchronousTreeModelViewer.java:672)
is different than in the other similar bugs, so I guess this build should already contain the other fixes.

After this first occurred, the NPE was thrown after every step operation.

Sorry, no steps to reproduce - after restart, it worked fine again.
Looks like the parent's widget is retrieved without checking to see if we actually have a parent.

Created an attachment (id=34775)
Check if null

One of many possible ways to fix this.
Marking as works for me. Unable to reproduce in I20060216-2000. We had a few fixes in this area.
